techmeme.title: Brazilian nonprofit Legal Games Institute estimates betting apps draw over $23B in wagers annually, nearly 10 times the Mafia-run animal lottery in the country (New York Times)

Court filing: Meta says it may have to "roll back or pause" some features in India after a CCI directive banned WhatsApp data sharing with Meta for ad purposes (Reuters)
Drake withdraws petition accusing UMG and Spotify of inflating Kendrick Lamar's "Not Like Us" with bots and payola; the diss track accused Drake of pedophilia (Steven J. Horowitz/Variety)
